sometimes ocd is taking too long to do literally anything because you physically cant stop yourself from obsessing and worrying and perfecting as you aim towards that evil unreachable point of perfection that taunts you every waking moment
sometimes ocd is refusing to even try to fix things in your life because you know youll never stop trying to perfect it and obsessing over it  part

sometimes ocd is sitting on the floor smacking your hands against your head as you tell yourself to get a grip when the intrusive thoughts make it hard to breathe sometimes ocd is refusing to even try to fix things in your life because you know youll never stop trying  part

sometimes ocd is utterly failing when you try to quit bad habits like picking at your scalp until it bleeds or scratching at your hands slowly until they bleed as you sit in class  sometimes ocd is obsessively cleaning and filing your finger nails so much part

breakocdstigma  ocd isnt necessarily keeping your spaces obsessively clean and organized   sometimes ocd is physically not being able to stop yourself as you pick at your eyebrows until nothings left  part

down into a diary i felt that way i could see it clear as day and process my thoughts and feelings properly and make a change to how i reacted to situations almost  years on and my life couldnt be better im in a fantastic relationship me and my children are happy

september  then i started to feel normal again if youve ever been in a place where youve been convinced that your crazy when you finally start to feel normal you have the motivation to do anything you can to make that feeling permanent i started writing my feelings

determined to make a change to how i reacted to situations and how my mood affected my children i got help i had been on many different tabletsmood stabilisers and they never seemed to help but finally i was put on the right medication my last suicide attempt was in

since all of my belongings had to be packed haphazardly and shoved into a storage unit there was no telling where it couldve wound up im still hoping i somehow overlooked it and keep searching i cant accept that its lost even after  years of rummaging

i realized that i needed to recover the copy of the paperwork i had filled out the packet that cost me a few weeks worth of groceries oh another little tidbit i was supposed to be reimbursed but never was i searched to no avail but surely it was only misplaced

places just to get approved for something it was in one of the more questionable parts of town that a woman overseeing my credit check  asked me to wait a moment after relaying that i was denied i waited she hurried outside removed her name tag and said

when the time came to renew i couldnt afford the price hike i had to move on elsewhere this is where things begin to take a dark turn application after application deposit after deposit all denied so much money and time wasted i resorted to scoping out the worst

one year later  i had been living at a real nice place for the remainder of  and into  having not been a stranger to breakins  i lost a lot during that time in my city of employment every area is a bad area so even the nicest gated communities arent perfect

as the unscathed windowed doors latched behind me i sighed deeply done with that despicable company once again oh yeah almost forgot i had brought a lawsuit against them before remember the friend i mentioned who was asked to pay yeah i had lived there too

gazing around the office i couldnt help but notice the taped off lockbox all damages were apparent inside the office but nothing outside not even the door so strange that their cameras caught diddly squat i didnt care anymore at that point i just wanted to move on

i even have a photo of the document i keep careful records of everything at the very least i try my best anyway the chapter was closing on yet another space i once called home we returned to the office they verified nothing else was owed and i signed off

an office employee procured the necessary document for notating damages to subtract from my deposit most graciously they made no mountains out of molehills just requested new blinds on one of the windowsthe one where my cat sons enjoyed lounginghunting birds and lizards

they distributed paperwork for those with stolen checks we had to pay a fee to have it processed it wasnt cheap but insured we would not be hassled in the future for a missing payment thank goodness well the glorious month of my departure arrived

but thats unfair they had already paid and were obviously not to blame two or so weeks later it happened at my complex i remember bursting into the main office guns a blazing as it were do not ask anyone involved for another payment i insisted and they didnt

this was actually part of a string of breakins throughout the area throughout their rental monopoly their hideous signage decorates most complexes within the city a friend mentioned a breakin at her complex and they asked for a new payment to replace what they lost

evil company they relentlessly gobble up as many properties as they can lightly renovate and price gouge potential residents and inevitably hit anyone renewing well a month prior to my move their lockbox had been broken into

if something gives someone that strong of a reaction then i say cool off before rudely insulting someone for liking it this is why i personally try to seek out positives in projects i lean toward disliking rewatch what im at odds with even

criticize away but because it is simply a film immense hatred goes well beyond critique anyone can roast it but i feel serious hate is too dark an approach and could lose many readers considering the content of reviews at all

even if ww made fewer mistakes it would still be an action romcom which means it still wouldnt jive with every viewer for what it is i personally like and enjoy a solid majority you wont see me being a jerk for the sake of tearing others down

i hope people arent wasting energy on legitimate hatred of ww that energy can be redirected toward actual problems irl the film may be clunky and messy but what does work can be enjoyable even catharticwhether its corny comedy or emotion

she had noticed that i was acting different at work amp wanted to check that i was ok those text messages saved my life she saved my life that night and i am forever grateful to have her in my life im getting emotional writing this
as i sat in my car on new years eve planning on how i was going to do it i knew how but i didnt want anyone else to get hurt my work best friend text and called me numerous times
i had never previously struggled with my mental health until that day i just went into shock after the shock began to settle i for the first time in my life considered taking my own life

i went back to my office and completely broke down i was exhausted and fed up with being made to feel like i was over exaggerating i left work at  walked home got into my car and drove to the middle of nowhere this was to be the day that i would end my life

despite knowing the circumstances my manager told me if you had kids youd have to get up and get on with it i was also told that its ok to come to work feeling and looking like shit i ended up staying at work for the rest of the day

i met with my doctor on the afternoon of she signed me off work for a further  weeks to get some rest amplet the meds kick in i went back to work to tell my manager she took my sick note looked at me and sighed she told me this was too much time to have off again

the bit in between is a really long story but on  i was at work i was struggling i hadnt slept in weeks i was being haunted by voices and a figure of a lady i was so confused and scared and i just wanted it to stop

my managers were really unsupportive despite being signed off work by my doctor occ health and other mh professionals were also in agreement my managers still tried to force me back and threatened me with dismissal

i was struggling so much i couldnt see a way out i was too ill to continue working i couldnt sleep i lost my appetite and even when i was hungry i would starve myself as punishment i pushed my friends amp family away i wanted them to hate me as much as i hated myself

in september  something happened that something would then go on to change the course of my life and the person i once was i was left suffering with ptsd depression amp anxiety i was scared so alone and i hated myself and the person i had become
ok so long personal tweet alert trigger warning suicide  im feeling the need to share this because st december marks  year  year ago today things could have been very different

im not sure if people actually see my tweets  i really must get better at tweeting more i seem to lose followers so quickly or it could be because i tweet a load of shit  of the time yeah its probably the latter

i really do love my job   i had to force myself to go home today  i just love that place so much changing jobs was probably the best decision ive ever had its defo improved my mental health amp its so nice to not dread going to work

however there are good days few amp far betweenbut on these days i want to thank my trauma amp the people who made my life hell over the last  months because it has made me stronger in ways i couldve never imagined  fuck you ptsd

most days i wake up with a heavy heart the trauma still so fresh on my mind its as if it happened yesterday on those days i hate myself and the person i have become i find myself desperately wanting to be the old me the me before my life fell apart  months ago
